title: Illtyd Williams
text:
Illtyd M. Williams was a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1930s. He played at club level for <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Castleford%20Tigers%20players">Heritage № 169</a>).
Playing career.
County League appearances.
Illtyd Williams played in <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford</a>'s victory in the <a href="RFL%20Yorkshire%20League">Yorkshire</a> <a href="Rugby%20league%20county%20leagues">County League</a> during the <a href="1938%E2%80%9339%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1938–39 season</a>.
